system.summary: Use your tools and spare metal to restore hit points to a construct.

description.value: Over a Rest Action, you can repair damage to a Construct using 1 Scrap Metal. Make a DC 10 Intelligence (Craft) check. On success, the Construct restores hit points equal to 1d10 + your Intelligence (Craft) Modifier. On failure, restore 1d4 + your Proficiency instead.
